summary: When a woman decides to take it upon herself to win back the love of her live, she realizes she'll have to sink to using her female prowess -- and becoming what she despises the most -- a woman who flirts.
cast: Xun Zhou|Xiaoming Huang|Yi-Lin Sie|Sonia Sui|Quniciren|Mike Kai Sui|Mu-Si Ni|Zhang Zhe|Jarrett Lee Anderson|Shiping Cao|Amber Chen|Shouqin Xu
title: Sa jiao nu ren zui hao ming
